name: Betterteem
description:
Betterteem is a predictive and prescriptive AI platform that enables businesses to predict unwanted employee resignations with AI.



Betterteem's AI-driven prediction resulted in an 18% increase in employee retention and a 41% increase in productivity in 2023, saving clients over US$18 million in backfill hiring costs and lost productivity.
one_liner:
Betterteem is a predictive and prescriptive AI platform that enables businesses to predict unwanted employee resignations with AI.



Betterteem's AI-driven prediction resulted in an 18% increase in employee retention and a 41% increase in productivity in 2023, saving clients over US$18 million in backfill hiring costs and lost productivity.
